power.title: Blazing Pursuit
power.fluff: You envelop your weapon in fire and then strike, the flames creating a lingering path that you can travel along to catch your escaping foe

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Will
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 2[W] + Intelligence modifier fire damage.

section.name: Hit (Will):
section.text: If the target is within 5 squares of you at the end of its next turn, you can use a free reaction to teleport to a space that is adjacent to the target. You do not need line of sight to the target or the space you teleport into.

section.name: Aegis of Assault:
section.text: You can teleport if the target is within a number of squares equal to 3 + your Strength modifier (minimum 5 squares) instead.

power.title: Chilling Blow
power.fluff: Your weapon rips into your foe and cold pulses from the wound, enveloping your enemy's body in a crust of frost

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Fortitude
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier cold damage.

section.name: Hit (Fortitude):
section.text: Until the start of your next turn, the target takes cold damage each time it makes an attack. The cold damage equals your Constitution modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Critical:
section.text: The target also takes the damage the first time it falls prone or willingly moves before the start of your next turn.

power.title: Crackling Burst
power.fluff: Your weapon sends out sprawling arcs of lightning that catch nearby enemies, making movement agonizing for them

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each enemy in the burst

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier lightning damage.

If the target willingly moves before the start of your next turn, it takes lightning damage equal to your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus. This effect ends if you are no longer within 2 squares of the target.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you targeted at least 2 enemies and miss all targets, the first target that willingly moves before the start of your next turn is subject to the lightning damage.

power.title: Dimensional Cleave
power.fluff: Your weapon is ready and waiting for a teleporting enemy

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy teleports or is teleported to a space within your reach

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering enemy

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.

section.name: Aegis of Ensnarement:
section.text: If the target willingly teleported, the attack deals additional damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Falcon's Mark
power.fluff: You send your weapon flying to seek out an enemy beyond your normal reach, using your magic to mark it as your foe

part.range2: weapon +2/+5 if your weapon can be thrown

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must throw your bonded weapon as part of making this attack.

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Will
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage, or 2[W] + Intelligence modifier force damage if your bonded weapon can normally be thrown.

section.name: Hit (Will):
section.text: The target is marked by you until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Arcane Aegis:
section.text: The target is marked by your arcane aegis.
If you already have another creature marked by you arcane aegis, both remain marked until the end of your next turn, at which point you decide which remains marked by your aegis.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Your weapon returns to your hand.

power.title: Flame Cyclone
power.fluff: Arcane power swirls around your weapon and outward toward your enemies, engulfing them in an inferno

section.name: Target:
section.text: Each creature in the blast

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage, or 2d6 + Intelligence modifier fire damage against a creature marked by you.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Your Intelligence modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus fire damage against a creature marked by you.

power.title: Foesnare
power.fluff: You cut into your foe, and links of solid eldritch energy appear to bind it to the ground

section.name: Target:
section.text: One creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Intelligence vs. AC and Fortitude
Make one attack roll and compare it to both

section.name: Hit (AC):
section.text: 1[W] + Intelligence modifier damage.

section.name: Hit (Fortitude):
section.text: The target is chained until the end of your next turn. The effect immediately ends if the target leaves its space.
While chained, the target is immobilized and reduces all forced movement against it by 3 squares, and any teleportation by 1 square.
Once while the target is chained, you can use the following action:

section.name: Opportunity Interrupt:
section.text: Trigger: The target is pushed, pulled, or slid; The target's reduction against forced movement from this attack doesn't apply against the triggering push, pull or slide.
